channel.title: Kbd?
channel.description:
With all these new bosses out older bosses get forgotten about like Dks, Kbd, Mith drags etc.
I was thinking maybe we could get a small team (trio or maybe a quad) constantly killing Kbd for some lootage as its always empty these days and tbh its one of the few only fun bosses in my opinion where your not brewing until a drop.. Hoping for 3-4 people to come as we can stand around the dragon so it's constantly spinning. The minimal requirements are: 80 Ranging (85+ recommended)/85+ Strength 40+ Defense as the reason why a trio or quad is to stop constant banking ;'o. Recommended: Range(Broad/better bolts)/Good melee D'hide(or better)/Barrows(+pray mage/better) 3-6 Saradomin Brews, 3 Super Restores, 3 Antifire/better potions, 4 Prayer potions, 3 Ranging potions, Sharks/better food (per load) A Beast of Burden
If's up to you what you use as long as you don't take the piss and use a Dragon Scim or something. In my opinion Kbd is a fun boss to kill and is the 27th strongest Npc in Rs so its easy to kill.
I just did this quickly so excuse any mistakes ^.^

item.title: Kbd?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Best way for kbd is 3 people range tanking, fastest kills and fastest profits based on the re spawn time of the KBD.

Exactly :P, the re-spawn time depends on how many players are on in the world that’s why I thought Kbd would be good as no-one ever goes now.
But you can also kill it pretty quickly with Melee assuming your near maxed give or taken 20 levels.

Read full topic
